thread.title: Man Utd news: Jose Mourinho names team he wants in Europa League draw | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man Utd news: Jose Mourinho names team he wants in Europa League draw | Metro News

author: Chris Davie For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man Utd news: Jose Mourinho names team he wants in Europa League draw | Metro News
text:
Chris Davie for Metro.co.uk Thursday 23 Feb 2017 10:58 am Jose Mourinho is unhappy with his side’s congested fixture schedule. (Getty Images) 
Jose Mourinho admits he would prefer Manchester United to face a team such as Lyon in the next round of the Europa League. 
United safely navigated their way into the last 16 of the competition after beating Saint-Etienne 4-0 on aggregate. 
Mourinho now faces a congested fixture schedule with United’s FA Cup tie against Chelsea moved to an evening kick-off on Monday, March 13. 
And the United manager admits he would prefer United play against a team that requires minimal travelling distance to ease his side’s problems. 
When asked if there is a team he would not like get in the Europa League draw, Mourinho replied: ‘Not really I’m used to difficult draws, sometimes I think some balls are cold and some balls are hot [when the draw is made]. Henrikh Mkhitaryan scored the winner against Saint-Etienne on Wednesday. (Getty Images)
